task.summary: Default task
Adds basic file structure.

Starts off the product abstract class.
Creates the drink test and adds setup of drink.

Adds machine setup.
Creates machine class.
Creates tests to get credit and cash and for adding coings to the machine.
Creates tests to get refund credit from the machine.
Creates tests to get vend an item from the machine.
Creates a test to check that if the item is out of stock then the credit remains.
